answerText: Montana Wildhack (accept either name)[10] Wildhack has a child with Billy Pilgrim on the planet of these toilet plunger-shaped aliens. This race sees in four dimensions, meaning that they experience all moments simultaneously.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Harvard A, UVA B | 1 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this star of a pornographic film in which she peels a banana, a locket-wearing actress who is kidnapped by a flying saucer and mated with another character in an alien zoo.
